DataItem.name: Active_Axes
DataItem.Source: A list of axes that are both Enabled and Visible.

DataItem.name: A_Axis_Coupling
DataItem.Source: Master Axis. (A CPLN stands for A Coupling.)

DataItem.name: B_Axis_Coupling
DataItem.Source: Slave Axis. (B CLPN stands for B Coupling.)

DataItem.name: A_MRZP_X
DataItem.Source: Master Table Axis Rotation Center X

DataItem.name: A_MRZP_Y
DataItem.Source: Master Table Axis Rotation Center Y

DataItem.name: A_MRZP_Z
DataItem.Source: Master Table Axis Rotation Center Z

DataItem.name: B_MRZP_X
DataItem.Source: Slave Table Axis Rotation Center X

DataItem.name: B_MRZP_Y
DataItem.Source: Slave Table Axis Rotation Center Y

DataItem.name: B_MRZP_Z
DataItem.Source: Slave Table Axis Rotation Center Z
